comments.author: Anton L
comments.content:
I like you! I don't know why... yes I actually do! I recognize that moment of inspiration, and that no thing in the world can record that feeling.. (tape, text, video, etc)

I too get wonderful thoughts when I'm by myself in the forest. That's the best friend I have... I always want to enlighten the internet-sphere with those thoughts, but when I'm sitting down and translating my experience into the medium, all I remember is some fragrants..
